title: Our Lady, Untier of Knots: Story of a Marian Devotion
description: During his studies in Germany, Pope Francis encountered a local devotion centred on an image of Our Lady in the Church of St Peter in Augsburg. Many had come to pray with seemingly irresolvable family and marriage problems and had been helped. On his return to Argentina he set about spreading this devotion and its novena.
author: Miguel Cuartero Samperi
